test-case.name: with correct login and correct password (await 'Successfully authorized!')
test-case.title: with correct login and correct password (await 'Successfully authorized!')

test-case.name: with correct login and incorrect password (await 'Login or password is invalid!')
test-case.title: with correct login and incorrect password (await 'Login or password is invalid!')

test-case.name: with incorrect login and incorrect password (await 'Login or password is invalid!')
test-case.title: with incorrect login and incorrect password (await 'Login or password is invalid!')

test-case.name: with empty login and empty password (await 'Login or password is invalid!')
test-case.title: with empty login and empty password (await 'Login or password is invalid!')
